front.title: The China Mobile, Huawei, and ZTE BNG Simple Control and User Plane Separation Protocol (S-CUSP)

abstract.t: To support Control Plane (CP) and User Plane (UP) Separation (CUPS) for fixed network Broadband Network Gateway (BNG) service providers, China Mobile, Huawei Technologies, and ZTE have developed a simple CUPS control channel Protocol (S-CUSP). This document is not an IETF standard and does not have IETF consensus. It is presented here to make the S-CUSP specification conveniently available to the Internet community to enable diagnosis and interoperability.
